definitions: a line made up of dots or dashes (often used in reference to the space left for a signature on a contract)

examples.text: Adam signed on the dotted line

shortDefinitions: line made up of dots or dashes

definitions: an indirect, informal, or secondary line of responsibility within an organization (as represented by a dotted line on an organizational chart)

examples.text: I report to Hal Jones, our CFO, with a dotted line to the audit committee
